Sentencas: This paper deals with the development and detailed assessment of a biomass-fuelled electrochemical power generation system employing biomass gasification, solid oxide fuel cell, gas turbine, and organic Rankine cycle.
Titulo: Performance assessment of a biomass fuelled advanced hybrid power generation system

Sentencas: The performance of the plant has been monitored with the changes in important operating parameters with respect to energetic, exergetic, economic and environmental points of view.
Titulo: Performance assessment of a biomass fuelled advanced hybrid power generation system

Sentencas: The proposed system yields the maximum 49.29% 1st law efficiency and 44.57% 2nd law efficiency.
Titulo: Performance assessment of a biomass fuelled advanced hybrid power generation system

Sentencas: Exergetic analysis reveals that among all the elements of the system, biomass gasifier is the highest (41.22%) contributor in total exergy destruction, followed by the heat exchanger (14.01%), and the organic Rankine boiler (13.27%).
Titulo: Performance assessment of a biomass fuelled advanced hybrid power generation system

Sentencas: Economic analysis reveals that the plant can generate electricity at a minimum rate of 0.0654 $/kWh.
Titulo: Performance assessment of a biomass fuelled advanced hybrid power generation system

Sentencas: The environmental analysis predicts that the proposed system has a maximum CO2 emission reduction potential of about 2867 tCO(2)/year compared to a coal-fired sub-critical steam power plant of similar capacity, resulting in an environmental benefit value of about 430014 $/year.
Titulo: Performance assessment of a biomass fuelled advanced hybrid power generation system

Sentencas: This study also reveals that the present system is better compared to previously investigated other biomass-fuelled power generation plants considering the efficiency and economy together.
Titulo: Performance assessment of a biomass fuelled advanced hybrid power generation system
